mailjet_get_statistics.description:
Get sending stats (delivered, open/click rates, bounces).

    Retrieve email statistics including delivery, open, click, bounce rates
    and engagement metrics for the specified period (up to 90 days).

    Args:
        params (GetStatisticsInput): Input containing:
            - days (int): Number of days of statistics (1-90, default 7)
            - response_format (str): 'markdown' or 'json'

    Returns:
        str: Statistics including delivered, opened, clicked, bounced counts
